home.title:
Drill. Loot. Repeat.
Then fight for survival.
home.list1:
CosmoFox is a Telegram-native, multi-
 stage Web3 game.
home.list2:
Start as a space-mining fox — drilling
 planets, collecting crystals, and
 upgrading your gear.
home.list3: More crystals = a bigger airdrop share.

about.title: about COSMOFOX
about.list1:
CosmoFox takes you on a galactic journey that
 evolves over time.
about.list2:
What begins as a simple race for resources grows
 into a richer universe with new mechanics,
 evolving gameplay, and an economy powered by
 $Zylo.
about.list3:
Phase 1 — a fast-paced clicker race: drill, loot
 and earn your share of the airdrop.
about.list4:
Phase 2 — the game expands: deeper mechanics, new
 challenges, and fresh ways to use $Zylo.

mine1.title: Diamond Dust
mine1.text1:
Common resource mined while
 drilling planets.
mine1.text2:
Spent to upgrade and strengthen
 your drill, improving efficiency
 and unlocking new layers of progression.

mine2.title: Ether Crystals
mine2.text1:
Premium resource with a small
 chance to drop while drilling.
mine2.text2:
Can be spent on loot boxes and
 purchases, or exchanged for
 $Zylo tokens during the Phase 1
  airdrop.

mine3.title: Drill
mine3.text1:
The Fox’s main tool for
 extracting resources from
 planets.
mine3.text2:
Upgrade its parts to boost
 drilling power, speed, and gain
 access to deeper layers and
 hidden treasures.

mine4.title: Ships
mine4.text1:
Essential for traveling between
 planets and star systems.
mine4.text2:
Buy and upgrade ships to
 increase travel speed, improve
 energy regeneration, and expand
 your cosmic reach.

token.text1: Use Zylo for upgrades, lootboxes, skins, and premium content
token.text2: Stake Zylo for passive income and exclusive in-game bonuses
token.text3: Earn Zylo in the airdrop by exchanging collected Crystals
token.text4: Part of every Zylo spend is burned, increasing long-term scarcity
